creator: maksym.kaban@gmail.com
text:
errorlog in virtual hosts causes an 'memory cannot be read' error and crashes
apache, if errorlog directory does not exist

creator: ben@playscapegames.com
text:
I have encountered this same bug on Apache 2.2.8.

As the reporter describes, a non-existent error logfile path in a VirtualHost config section causes Apache to crash.

This seems like a serious and easily replicated bug. Why has this sat open since Sept 2006 without any action?

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Works in 2.2.x for me, and 2.0 and XP are EOL.
